nio/VideoConvert.description: Convert individual frames to images.  Input raw CV frame (numpy arrays) and output converted frame.

extension.title: Image Extension
extension.description: Type of image file to output.

default.description: A signal containing the resulting image and the extension type.

nio/VideoOutput.description: Captures video stream from specified source and notifies the frames as signals.

grayscale.title: Convert to grayscale
grayscale.description: Convert colored video stream to grayscale.

openOnStart.title: Open source on start
openOnStart.description: Start capturing video stream when block starts (hidden property).

source.title: Video Source
source.description: Where to find the streaming camera.

default.description: A signal with the individual captured frames.

nio/VideoSave.description: Save a video stream to a specified file.

filename.title: Filename
filename.description: File name to save video stream to.
